tourism_samples.title: Sigiriya Rock Fortress
tourism_samples.description: Sigiriya, known as Lion Rock, is an ancient fortress in central Sri Lanka with frescoes, water gardens, and terraced landscapes. Visitors can climb to the summit for panoramic views.

tourism_samples.title: Ella
tourism_samples.description: Ella is a tranquil hill town with lush tea plantations, waterfalls, and scenic hiking trails like Ella Rock and Little Adam’s Peak.

tourism_samples.title: Galle Fort
tourism_samples.description: Galle Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is a historic coastal fortress with cobblestone streets, colonial buildings, museums, and cultural events.

tourism_samples.title: Temple of the Tooth Relic
tourism_samples.description: Located in Kandy, this temple houses a sacred tooth of Buddha. Visitors can experience ceremonies, ornate architecture, and traditional rituals.

tourism_samples.title: Yala National Park
tourism_samples.description: Yala National Park is a wildlife sanctuary in southeastern Sri Lanka, home to leopards, elephants, and birds. Guided safaris allow visitors to explore its landscapes.

tourism_samples.title: Nuwara Eliya
tourism_samples.description: Nuwara Eliya, ‘Little England,’ is a cool highland town with tea estates, waterfalls, lakes, and colonial-era architecture.

tourism_samples.title: Mirissa Beach
tourism_samples.description: Mirissa is a southern coastal town with golden beaches, turquoise waters, whale watching, surfing, and local seafood restaurants.

tourism_samples.title: Anuradhapura Sacred City
tourism_samples.description: Anuradhapura is an ancient UNESCO city with stupas, monasteries, and historical ruins. Pilgrims and tourists explore its religious and cultural heritage.

tourism_samples.title: Horton Plains National Park
tourism_samples.description: Horton Plains is a highland plateau with cloud forests, grasslands, waterfalls, and the dramatic World’s End cliff offering panoramic views.

tourism_samples.title: Trincomalee
tourism_samples.description: Trincomalee is a historic coastal city in northeastern Sri Lanka, known for pristine beaches, Koneswaram Temple, diving spots, and colonial-era forts.
